casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2007. C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Eric Glenn Lane, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Deliver Transcripts:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 9th day of April 2007 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2007."
